Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: CAA but not acrolein inhibited the cysteine proteases caspase - 3 , caspase - 8 and cathepsin B .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| CAA (Cerebral Autosomal Dominant Arteriopathy with Subcortical Infracts and Leukoencephalopathy) |
| - caspase - 3 |
| - caspase - 8 |
| - cathepsin B |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Cerebral Autosomal Dominant Arteriopathy with Subcortical Infracts and Leukoencephalopathy (CAA) |
| - caspase - 3 |
| - caspase - 8 |
| - cathepsin B |

Note: CAA is a disease, and the mentioned caspases and cathepsin are enzymes involved in various diseases, including CAA, but for the purpose of this question, they are considered part of the disease entity since they are specifically mentioned in relation to CAA.
